function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Over-dependence on a single funding source for PCAs","Impact":"Insufficient funding to meet the needs of PCAs","Mitigation":"Diversifying the funding base to reduce reliance on a single source","Technologies":"Financial diversification strategies, crowdfunding platforms","People":"Nature conservation organizations, PCAs managers","Owner":"Nature conservation organizations, government agencies"},{"Description":"Inadequate public support and interest in nature conservation and PCAs","Impact":"Reduced funding, reduced engagement with conservation initiatives","Mitigation":"Raising public awareness and interest in nature conservation, engaging in public outreach and education","Technologies":"Social media campaigns, educational programs, community engagement platforms","People":"Nature conservation organizations, local communities","Owner":"Nature conservation organizations, government agencies"},{"Description":"Insufficient revenue generation from tourism for PCAs","Impact":"Decreased financial support for PCAs from tourism, limiting resources for conservation efforts","Mitigation":"Diversifying revenue streams, promoting alternative sources of income for PCAs","Technologies":"Marketing and promotion strategies, ecotourism initiatives","People":"PCAs managers, tourism agencies","Owner":"PCAs managers, local government"}]}
